SORCE MANUFACTURING.

We are a production machine shop located in Yuba City, specializing in production C.N.C turning. We also have a tooling department for your prototype or short-run orders. By paying attention to detail, using state of the art equipment, we can offer you a premium quality machine parts efficiently and economically. We are a good vendor looking for good customers. We will give you what you want, when you want it, at the price you can live with. We would appreciate the opportunity to meet with you and discuss your machining needs.
